main event: On November 7, 1951, an unidentified object was observed in the sky over Montreal, Canada, moving at high speed and disappearing quickly.
interesting points: The object was oval in shape and silvery in color., It was seen moving smoothly at an estimated altitude of 10,000 feet., The observation lasted approximately 10-15 seconds., No sound was heard during the sighting., The report is part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force investigation into UFOs.
witness description: The witness is a former Army Officer familiar with conventional aircraft.
